description: Add a new field in module type definition
Change a field type in module type definition
Remove a field from module type definition
Change the order of the field in module type definition
Change anydata type to a specific type in module type definition
Add default value for a record field
oldCode:
public type Person record {
	string name;};
newCode:
public type Person record {
	string name = "hello";};

description: Remove default value from a record field
oldCode:
public type Person record {
	string name = "hello";};
newCode:
public type Person record {
	string name;};

description: Modify default value from a record field
oldCode:
public type Person record {
	string name = "hello";};
newCode:
public type Person record {
	string name = "hi";};
